```{r}

#zad1

model <- lm(MEAN.ANNUAL.RAINFALL ~ 1, data = train)

mean <- mean(data$MEAN.ANNUAL.RAINFALL)

mean
summary(model)
 
#zad2

rmse(train$MEAN.ANNUAL.RAINFALL,pred)

RMSE1_train <- rmse(train$MEAN.ANNUAL.RAINFALL,predict(model,test))

```
